title: Manage a Workers' Compensation Claim
description: An employee was injured on the job and needs to file a workers' compensation claim.

tasks.description: Receive the report of the workplace injury.
tasks.expected_outcome: The safety manager receives the initial injury report.

tasks.description: Provide the employee with the required claim forms and information on approved medical providers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager gives the employee all necessary paperwork.

tasks.description: File the 'First Report of Injury' with the company's workers' compensation insurance carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully submits the claim to the insurance provider.
